about.title: About
about.desc: Browse, set, and submit your Rail Map Painter works here!
about.content1: In memory of all the freedom and equality we once had.
about.52PD: Special thanks for his continuous effort in maintaining works.
about.linchen1965: Special thanks for his continuous effort in maintaining works.
about.githubContent: Face any problems? Search or raise an issue here!

gallery.noTravelAdvice: While the works presented here come from the real world, they may not always reflect reality accurately. Therefore, please do not rely solely on this information for travel advice!

details.title: Details
details.import: You may directly use this work if your are in Rail Map Painter or Rail Map Toolkit

donation.title: Support us
donation.content1: Thank you for considering making a donation to Rail Map Toolkit. Your support will enable us to continue updating and enhancing this outstanding project.
donation.content2: By donating, you will also be able to upload your fantasy works which can then be showcased in this gallery, and shared via an auto-generated random link. e.g.
donation.content3: If you make an early bird donation prior to August 26, 2023, you could potentially qualify for receiving a personalized link. Act now by donating and completing the additional field with your early bird Github issue link, along with your preferred personalized link.
donation.content4: Thank you again for supporting the Rail Map Toolkit. You may find terms and conditions below as well as how to donate using various methods.
donation.terms1: Donations are non-refundable under any circumstances.
donation.terms2: Any payment should be for donation purposes only, and does not constitute a contract for the purchase of any products or services.
donation.terms3: Additionally, we will add users who have donated to a whitelist that can update the gallery.
donation.terms4: You may use the required donation amount above from your total donation to upload and showcase one of your fantasy work. The total fantasy works multiplied by the required donation amount cannot exceed your total donation.
donation.terms5: After donation and uploading the work, it can be accessed no later than 24 hours afterwards.
donation.terms6: For early bird donations, you have 60 days to donate and upload data. Find out more in your Github's issue. Failure to donate and upload data in a timely manner will result in the loss of eligibility to use personalized links.
donation.terms7: Personalized links may be taken based on the order of donations, in case of conflicts.
donation.terms8: All provided data will be publicly available on the internet for anyone to browse. However, the ownership of the work still remains in your hands, but is still subject to the terms of the Rail Map Painter.
donation.terms9: Links will be valid within 365 days of being added to the gallery. Donating again and re-requesting before the link expires will extend its validity until you no longer donate or re-request. After it expires, the previously obtained link may be revoked and allocated to other works.
donation.terms10: Uploaded works must not contain any political bias, pornography, violence or infringement of intellectual property rights. Inappropriate works and links will be blocked and removed.
donation.terms11: We believe in a free and open internet. If you have a Uniform Resource Locator address that can be accessed by global users, you can share your work using a link with extra parameters. This feature should be launched before 2024 Spring Festival.
donation.terms12: We have the right to interpret the terms and conditions. We reserve the right to modify, add, or remove these terms without further notice.
donation.methodGithubAccount: You must need a Github account before donation.
donation.methodMessageContains: The message should contain your Github username and your work's name so that we can match your donation with your Github issue.
donation.methodCN: Donate in CNY via Alipay or Wechat Pay
donation.methodAfdianAccount: You may donate with or without a 爱发电 account.
donation.methodCNMethod: Alipay and Wechat Pay are available in this donation method.
donation.methodCNLeaveMessage: If you choose to donate with a 爱发电 account, please make sure the name of your 爱发电 account matches your Github account. If you choose to donate without a 爱发电 account, leave a message as suggested below.
donation.methodUS: Donate in USD via Paypal or Visa card
donation.methodOpenCollectiveAccount: You may donate with or without an Open Collective account.
donation.methodUSMethod: Paypal and visa card are available in this donation method.
donation.methodUSLeaveMessage: If you choose to donate with an Open Collective account, please make sure the name of your Open Collective account matches your Github account. If you choose to donate without an Open Collective account, leave a public message to thekingofcity in Rail Map Toolkit is all of us section. The content of the message is suggested below.
donation.next: Already donated? Submit your work here!
